org.apache.flink.yarn

类 AbstractYarnClusterDescriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.yarn.AbstractYarnClusterDescriptor
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    ClusterDescriptor<YarnClusterClient>
    直接已知子类:
    YarnClusterDescriptor, YarnClusterDescriptorV2

    public abstract class AbstractYarnClusterDescriptor
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClusterDescriptor<YarnClusterClient>
    The descriptor with deployment information for spawning or resuming a YarnClusterClient.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明

      Singleton object which uses reflection to determine whether the ApplicationSubmissionContext supports various methods which, depending on the Hadoop version, may or may not be supported.

      • addShipFiles

        public void addShipFiles(java.util.List<java.io.File> shipFiles)
        Adds the given files to the list of files to ship.

        Note that any file matching "flink-dist*.jar" will be excluded from the upload by uploadAndRegisterFiles(Collection, FileSystem, Path, ApplicationId, List, Map, StringBuilder) since we upload the Flink uber jar ourselves and do not need to deploy it multiple times.

        参数:
        shipFiles - files to ship

      • setDynamicPropertiesEncoded

        public void setDynamicPropertiesEncoded(java.lang.String dynamicPropertiesEncoded)

      • deployJobCluster

        public YarnClusterClient deployJobCluster(ClusterSpecification clusterSpecification,
                                          JobGraph jobGraph)
        从接口复制的说明: ClusterDescriptor
        Deploys a per-job cluster with the given job on the cluster.
        指定者:
        deployJobCluster 在接口中 ClusterDescriptor<YarnClusterClient>
        参数:
        clusterSpecification - Initial cluster specification with which the Flink cluster is launched
        jobGraph - JobGraph with which the job cluster is started
        返回:
        Cluster client to talk to the Flink cluster

      • deployInternal

        protected YarnClusterClient deployInternal(ClusterSpecification clusterSpecification,
                                           java.lang.String yarnClusterEntrypoint,
                                           @Nullable
                                           JobGraph jobGraph)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        This method will block until the ApplicationMaster/JobManager have been deployed on YARN.
        参数:
        clusterSpecification - Initial cluster specification for the to be deployed Flink cluster
        jobGraph - A job graph which is deployed with the Flink cluster, null if none
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • setupSingleLocalResource

        private static org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path setupSingleLocalResource(java.lang.String key,
                                                                  org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem fs,
                                                                  org.apache.hadoop.yarn.api.records.ApplicationId appId,
                                                                  org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path localSrcPath,
                                                                  java.util.Map<java.lang.String,org.apache.hadoop.yarn.api.records.LocalResource> localResources,
                                                                  org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path targetHomeDir,
                                                                  java.lang.String relativeTargetPath)
                                                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                  java.net.URISyntaxException
        Uploads and registers a single resource and adds it to localResources.
        参数:
        key - the key to add the resource under
        fs - the remote file system to upload to
        appId - application ID
        localSrcPath - local path to the file
        localResources - map of resources
        返回:
        the remote path to the uploaded resource
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException
        java.net.URISyntaxException

      • uploadAndRegisterFiles

        static java.util.List<java.lang.String> uploadAndRegisterFiles(java.util.Collection<java.io.File> shipFiles,
                                                               org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem fs,
                                                               org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path targetHomeDir,
                                                               org.apache.hadoop.yarn.api.records.ApplicationId appId,
                                                               java.util.List<org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path> remotePaths,
                                                               java.util.Map<java.lang.String,org.apache.hadoop.yarn.api.records.LocalResource> localResources,
                                                               java.lang.StringBuilder envShipFileList)
                                                        throws java.io.IOException,
                                                               java.net.URISyntaxException
        Recursively uploads (and registers) any (user and system) files in shipFiles except for files matching "flink-dist*.jar" which should be uploaded separately.
        参数:
        shipFiles - files to upload
        fs - file system to upload to
        targetHomeDir - remote home directory to upload to
        appId - application ID
        remotePaths - paths of the remote resources (uploaded resources will be added)
        localResources - map of resources (uploaded resources will be added)
        envShipFileList - list of shipped files in a format understood by Utils.createTaskExecutorContext(org.apache.flink.configuration.Configuration, org.apache.hadoop.yarn.conf.YarnConfiguration, java.util.Map<java.lang.String, java.lang.String>, org.apache.flink.runtime.clusterframework.ContaineredTaskManagerParameters, org.apache.flink.configuration.Configuration, java.lang.String, java.lang.Class<?>, org.slf4j.Logger)
        返回:
        list of class paths with the the proper resource keys from the registration
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException
        java.net.URISyntaxException

      • failSessionDuringDeployment

        private void failSessionDuringDeployment(org.apache.hadoop.yarn.client.api.YarnClient yarnClient,
                                         org.apache.hadoop.yarn.client.api.YarnClientApplication yarnApplication)
        Kills YARN application and stops YARN client.

        Use this method to kill the App before it has been properly deployed
